message: Let's start fair. I take the majority, but you get a decent share.  We can negotiate from here.
I think a 55/45 split is a fairer starting point.  Let's see if we can work something out.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's meet in the middle with a 60/40 split. This gives us both a good amount and allows us to avoid the continued devaluation of the money.
